feed.title: Project CovidRecon
feed.subtitle: This is a project that aims to create a platform that lets user knows about Covid-19. It scrapes data from different legitimate sources and visualizes these data so that user can easily understand it.

entry.title: Welcome to Project CovidRecon!
entry.content: This is the first update post regarindg the program. We started the project by first practicing web scrapping and twitter api in gathering data.
entry.summary: This is the first update post regarindg the program. We started the project by first practicing web scrapping and twitter api in gathering data.
